column4: DasEi; dumps me on the wrong hard drive. Pretend for the sake of arument that nothing other hten the USB disk is mounted

DasEi; Now, I have a handful of files, none of which look like the normal / directory...I'm trying to access what would be the home drectory should I boot from this disk rather then my normal boot order.
why on earth do you need the mount point for my hard disks? Nothing personal but the drive in question is mounted
